channel.title: hi I wanna know how connect internet in other browser in whonix
channel.description: good more than anything wanted to know how to do that, I wait you can help me

item.title: hi I wanna know how connect internet in other browser in whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

If that should be the case, I recommend using a VPN after the Tor connection, as currently there is no way to set exit nodes based on countries as that is not really something the Tor network was desined for. How you use a VPN with Whonix has been explained here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tunnels/Introduction

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: hi I wanna know how connect internet in other browser in whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

What do you mean by “of a specific place”? Like said, anything run inside the workstation automatically goes trough Tor, no need to do anything there.

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: hi I wanna know how connect internet in other browser in whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

The Tor Browser Bundle is actually an improved version of Firefox, the standard version of Firefox is however also included with Whonix, named iceweasel. However, keep in mind that, as mentioned before, this won’t make you truly anonymous.

Have a nice day,

Ego

item.title: hi I wanna know how connect internet in other browser in whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Not sure what you mean. Any program, including any browser, which you install in the workstation is automatically connected via Tor over the gateway. However, please keep this in mind: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Tor_Browser#Anonymity_vs_Pseudonymity

Have a nice day,

Ego
